Text:
Hi,

I've have an Xbox 360 Slim 250 GB .
Can it be modified to play backups ?
Also , is this a Backup ?

What should i do to play this ?

Plzzz reply ......

You have to remove the cd drive, extract the key using a probe to get it in vendor mode and re-flash using the latest software. Currently the  9504 drive is the only one that can be re-flowed on the slims..Use Google, the answers to all of your questions are a key stroke away..Good luck!
